Michael Vick was once the NFL's highest-paid player, and he made an estimated$ 7 million in endorsements during his six seasons with the Atlanta Falcons. chief executive in a surprising management reshuffling announced with the Internet company's fourth-quarter earnings, which jumped 29%. The Mountain View, Calif., company said the moves, effective April 4, were made to streamline decision-making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt will no longer be responsible for the day-to-day operations. Instead, he will become exective chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. said Ms Gabrielle Giffords had improved to the point where she could move both sides of her body, including her arms and legs. Speaking on CBS' Face the Nation, Ms Kirsten Gillibrand said Ms Gabrielle Giffords was showing raw courage, raw strength, something that we can all get behind. And she really is our glimmer of hope in a very dark time .
